title: No Signal screen after champion select (game does not load) Help please
body:
About 9 days ago I played some games in a row and everything was fine. Then all of a sudden I que up for another one, and after champion select my screen just goes blue and "No Signal". Game starts, I hear no sound from the rift so I know the game did not even load for me. Remake... This happens every single time since then, did multiple tests in custom game mode.
Reinstalled 2 times, once with the "old" client (that I am normally using) and once with the new one, still have the same problem. Googled for some answers but didn't find any to solve my problem. 
I am out of ideas, this should be the best place to find a solution, so please, help me.

replies.body: There was an issue previously resulting in that error, and pressing Alt+Enter served as a workaround.  Try that for now, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further.  We'll help individually and see why you might be having this issue still.  We'll reply back asap!

Yes alt+enter worked, it put me in window mode and everything is back to normal but I hope this problem gets fixed someday I prefer the fullscreen much more.
Thank you!

Yeah well I expected to be given such an answer if I immediately reported the problem and for that reason I waited 9 days. How much longer...
